answers.answer: My baby is measuring to be estamated 8-11 lbs she was 6lb 1 oz on friday at 35 weeks also i didnt get gestational diabeties either. My aunt delivered 2 12 lb babies naturally so im sure you will be fine

My first was 9lbs 3oz - being monitored more this time and got another ultrasound on Thurs to check her size. She was measuring normal at 32 weeks and I'll be 36 weeks on Thurs - I feel huge. I'm scared as had 4th degree tears with my first!
I didn't have diabetes last time and not got it this time either!

My baby is measuring big too! Last Thursday the ultrasound tech told me the baby is 9lbs 1oz. I go to my OB this week and hopefully this baby will come this week! I've been eating pineapple and having plenty of sex so I won't have to be induced or have a C section. That's m main concern
Oh and I forgot to mention he's still head up :(

I went today and my LO is head down and face up, measuring 7lbs 10oz. I turn 36 weeks tomorrow. My first was born the day I turned 36 weeks and he weighed 7lbs 9oz.he came out bigger than estimated. So I'm kinda nervous with this one. I plan to talk to my doctor about my options but my appointment isn't until next week
I was told my last was 9 pounds and he was born a week late and weighed 7 pounds 1 ounce
Twins.. Over 6lbs at 34 weeks and 5 days

question: So just had my last ultrasound to see the size of the baby and he measured at 9.6 pounds but she told me to take a pound off so he is pretty much 8.6! Anyone else have a big baby at 37 weeks and 4 days?? Am I going to be able to give birth naturally?? And I tested negative for gestational diabetes at 28 weeks so is it normal to still have this big of a baby? Sorry so many questions I'm a ftm and worry wart!
title: big baby!
